Name : Henrik Andersson

Email : henke&henke37.cjb.net

MIME media type name : Video

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.radgamettools.smacker

Required parameters : There are no defined parameters.

Optional parameters :
There are no defined parameters.

Encoding considerations : binary


Security considerations :
The security issues associated with this type have not been assessed.

Interoperability considerations :


Published specification :
Smacker is a closed format and has no published specification.

Applications which use this media :
Various video games

Additional information :

1. Magic number(s) : .
2. File extension(s) : *.smk
3. Macintosh file type code : .
4. Object Identifiers: .



Person to contact for further information :

1. Name : Henrik Andersson
2. Email : henke&henke37.cjb.net

Intended usage : Obsolete
Smacker is considered obsolete in favor of Bink.

Author/Change controller : Henrik Andersson, on behalf of RAD Game Tools.
